resources.string: The Brazil Popular Pharmacy Program has to be an initiative of the Federal Government authorizing the Oswaldo Cruz Foundation (FIOCRUZ) to provide medicines by compensation, and by Decree No. 5,090, of May 20, 2004, which regulates Law 10,858 and establishes the Popular Pharmacy program Brazil. The units themselves have a list of 112 items, including drugs and male condoms, which are dispensed by its cost, a reduction of up to 90% of market value. The condition for the purchase of medicines available in the units, in this case, is the presentation document with photo, in stating your Social Security number, along with a medical or dental prescription. Importantly, only the Own Network accepts prescriptions written by dentists.
